ProjectTitle: Animal Minds and the Puzzle of Perception. A 17th-Century Debate
InitialFeedbackHistory:
03/12/2024
You used an older DMP template, please convert your DMP to the Flemish standard DMP template, you can find this template in DMPonline.be or on the FWO website https://www.fwo.be/en/about-fwo/research-policy/data-management-plan-dmp/. We recommend converting this at your earliest convenience and submitting as intermediate DMP, but please make sure that the final DMP that FWO will ask you to submit at the end of the project follows the new template
